page.title: 15LAW & ORDER IN ASSYNT
page.content: Assynt has one small police station & a staff of one. The policeman can call for aid to Bonar Bridge which would send up a Patrol car if necessary. He can call for help from the local Special Constables if necessary. The commonest crimes here are Deer & Salmon Poaching & Drunk driving however incidents recorded are not frequent, crimes averaging out at 4 per month for the whole of the policemans area. The policeman's busiest time is during the Summer when there are many visitors. People charged with Crimes have to travel to Dornoch Court for trial & sentence. All in all we are lucky to live in a relative crime-free area.
